QuestData.Title: The Unrelenting Horde
QuestData.Description: While it is of utmost importance that you secure weapon crates immediately, we need the Unearthed Grounds to the east clear of Horde. If we are to open a supply line for our Grimtotem allies, we're going to need full access to the dig site.$B$BKill all Horde that you come across at the Unearthed Grounds, $n. For the glory of the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 12 Horde enemies at the Unearthed Grounds.
QuestData.RewardText: I will call for the infantry to move in and clear up whatever might be left over. If only we had ten-thousand more like you, $n!
